summary: Astor is dumped by Mila. He bumps into her ex friend, Cali. She shows him how to get Mila back/approach women and what he did wrong in the past.
cast: Fran Kranz|Dichen Lachman|Beau Garrett|Caitlin Stasey|Enver Gjokaj|Karim Saleh|Miracle Laurie|Felicia Day|Maurissa Tancharoen|Sophie King|Julie Mond|Jonathan Oldham|J.R. Starr|Amelia Alvarez|Genevieve Farrell|Sharon Wyse|Julie Bersani|Christopher Boulos|Casey Kooyman|Lauren Martini|Andrew Napier
title: Lust for Love
